subject: Delay in AHU delivery
body: The air handling unit shipment will arrive 2 days later due to customs delay. We apologize for the inconvenience and will expedite once released from customs.

subject: Weekly Progress Report - Week 34
body: Electrical and HVAC rough-ins complete on Level 3. Fire protection systems installation starting next week. Schedule is on track with 85% completion.

subject: RFI #202 Clarification on Fire Damper
body: Please confirm if the fire damper should be UL-rated per Section 233100. Current drawings show conflicting specifications.

subject: Glass curtain wall panels ready for delivery
body: All curtain wall panels for the south facade are ready. Delivery scheduled for next Monday, October 30th at 7 AM.

subject: Safety Inspection - 2 violations on Level 8
body: Safety inspection found 2 violations: missing handrails on temporary stairs and improper storage of materials. Please address immediately.

subject: Revised drawing set - Version 3.2 for lobby area
body: Updated lobby area drawings issued. Key changes include revised ceiling heights and updated material specifications per client request.
